descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Anthony Edwards steals the rock and unloads a massive slam to extend the Timberwolves' lead early in the first quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Ant-Man gets it done on both ends of the court) 2022/03/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ant-Man gets it done on both ends of the court

videos.description: Clear the runway as Bam Adebayo elevates for the big-time flush to put the Heat on the board.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam takes flight and throws down the hammer) 2022/03/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam takes flight and throws down the hammer

videos.description: Bam Adebayo soars through the paint and somehow gets the and-1 to fall.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam shows off his athleticism as he somehow drains the and-1) 2022/03/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam shows off his athleticism as he somehow drains the and-1

videos.description: Taurean Prince splits two defenders and knocks down the smooth and-1 to extend the Timberwolves' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Taurean Prince is smooth as silk as he drains the and-1) 2022/03/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Taurean Prince is smooth as silk as he drains the and-1

videos.description: Taurean Prince pulls up and knocks down the triple as time expires to end the third quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Taurean Prince hits buzzer-beater vs. Miami Heat) 2022/03/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Taurean Prince beats the 3rd quarter buzzer with this deep 3
